query: SELECT id, name, email, subscription_tier, trial_started_at, trial_expires_at, stripe_customer_id, stripe_subscription_id FROM users WHERE open_id = (SELECT value FROM _metadata WHERE key = 'OWNER_OPEN_ID' LIMIT 1) OR role = 'admin' LIMIT 5;
